name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: fs.trash.checkpoint.interval
description:
Number of minutes between trash checkpoints.
  Should be smaller or equal to fs.trash.interval. If zero,
  the value is set to the value of fs.trash.interval.
  Every time the checkpointer runs it creates a new checkpoint
  out of current and removes checkpoints created more than
  fs.trash.interval minutes ago.

name: dfs.namenode.snapshot.max.limit
description:
Limits the maximum number of snapshots allowed per snapshottable
    directory.If the configuration is not set, the default limit
    for maximum no of snapshots allowed is 65536.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.shuffle.log.limit.kb
description:
Maximum size of the syslog.shuffle file in kilobytes
    (0 for no limit).

name: dfs.datanode.lock-reporting-threshold-ms
description:
When thread waits to obtain a lock, or a thread holds a lock for
    more than the threshold, a log message will be written. Note that
    dfs.lock.suppress.warning.interval ensures a single log message is
    emitted per interval for waiting threads and a single message for holding
    threads to avoid excessive logging.

name: tfile.fs.input.buffer.size
description: Buffer size used for FSDataInputStream in bytes.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-user-done-dir.permissions
description:
The permissions of the user directories in
  ${mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir}. The user and the group
  permission must be 7, this is enforced.

name: ipc.client.rpc-timeout.ms
description:
Timeout on waiting response from server, in milliseconds.
  If ipc.client.ping is set to true and this rpc-timeout is greater than
  the value of ipc.ping.interval, the effective value of the rpc-timeout is
  rounded up to multiple of ipc.ping.interval.
